channel.title: How can i FIX my player rights problem?!?!?
channel.description:
Hey i change my player rights from 0 to 3 when logged off, but then it automatically just changed back to 0 when i log back in and then out again... because of auto save..
so obviously there is something wrong with my saving in the character notepad..
CAN ANYONE PLEASE HELP ME FIX THE PROBLEM
THANK YOU

item.title: How can i FIX my player rights problem?!?!?
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

By reset, I meant close it and re run it.
